original_text: Use bronze to make all the tools that you will use in the tabernacle. Also use bronze to make the pegs that fix the tent of the tabernacle to the ground. And make bronze pegs to fix the curtain around the yard to the ground.
korean_text: 성막에서 쓰는 모든 기구와 그 말뚝과 뜰의 포장 말뚝을 다 놋으로 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Use bronze to make all the tools
that you will use in the tabernacle
Also use bronze to make the pegs
that fix the tent of the tabernacle to the ground
to fix the curtain around the yard to the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰 주위의 휘장을 땅에 고정하기 위한 말뚝들을
